It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread. As defense secretary under George W. World journalist Sean Hoare that Andy Coulson presided over a culture of phone hacking while he was in charge, he released a statement in which he "emphatically denied" the claims. A spokesman for Andy Coulson said: Andy Coulson has today told the Metropolitan police that he is happy to voluntarily meet with them following allegations made by Sean Hoare . Mr Andy Coulson emphatically denies these allegations.
